class_notes: (ON CAMPUS) (Can be taken concurrently with NT 650 in order to add additional work in Greek Exegesis to the course)
course_description: An exegetical study of Paul's letter to the church at Rome.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates NT501 or equivalent as a prerequisite for MDiv and Non-degree students.
schedule_location: MW 4pm-5:20pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_250
